data.title: A little profanity with your meal?
data.text:
Went to redeem my two young kids' reading certificates.  Got to the cashier and before I could hand her the coupons she had already rung up the purchase. When I held up the coupons she exclaimed "Oh s***! Only those?!"  

They did not have any fruit for sides.  The chips were stale and over salted.  Then about half way through my steak bowl ( which was great!)  the  kids' quesadillas finally showed up, thankfully they loved them. 

Don't live in the neighborhood so it's safe to say I won't be back to this Chipotle.

data.title: Great food
data.text: Friendly, clean and accessible.   Great value for money.  Will go back for more!  Food quality was very good.

data.title: Horrible staff
data.text: Went in with my child and ordered a barbacoa burrito as well as a veggie bowl.  The lady making the burrito did not know how to wrap it and it felt apart so she had to use to tortillas. As I went to pay they decided to charge me for that extra tortilla when it was clearly their fault and I had not asked for it. Our order of I repeat a barbacoa burrito and a veggie bowl came out to $25! Every other time I had only paid around 18 bucks for the same order. I was socked at the price and when I asked them about it I got a very rude response and asked to pay it or leave. I paid for the meal but never again will I return here that is for sure!

data.title: It is what it is, this place is clean and friendly.
data.text: The food is what it is, no different then any other Chipotle, which is good. What sets this one apart is the staff. This place is CLEAN!!! As soon as somebody leaves somebody is out to wipe down the table. The staff acts like your a regular when you come in. Not just friendly but genuinely concerned about your experience.
